page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: This Block is made up of{gently } {rolling countryside}which is sharp contrast to the very hilly regions which surround it on three out of the four sides. In the{North East}is the oldest corner of the{Village of Williton, } including the Parish Church. In the {North West}are the very interesting remains of the{Cistercian Abbey of } {Old Cleeve. } The remainder of the area is taken up with{farmland of a very {productive nature. } And, apart from the corner of Williton, settlement is very thin and scattered. There are some{large estates. } One of the most interesting being at {Orchard Wyndham.} The Wyndham family having played an important role in the development of this area over a number of years.
